SEARCH
Package Distributed

Interface ServerRMIInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerImpl
public interface ServerRMIInterface extends Remote
This interface defines the server-side application methods that can be invoked on a remote object using RMI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    register(ClientRMIInterface client)
    Executes the registration of the client to the game.
    void
    updateServerChoices(ClientRMIInterface client, int number)
    Updates the server with the number of slots selected by the input client.
    void
    updateServerInsert(ClientRMIInterface client, int column)
    Updates the server with the shelf column to perform the insertion chosen by the input client.
    void
    updateServerReorder(ClientRMIInterface client, OrderChoice C)
    Updates the server with the slots selected by the input client.
    void
    updateServerSelection(ClientRMIInterface client, SlotChoice[] SC)
    Updates the server with the slots selected by the input client.

  • Method Details

    • register

      void register(ClientRMIInterface client) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, RemoteException, SameNicknameException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Executes the registration of the client to the game.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to register.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurred during the IO operation.
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If an error occurred during the reading af a json file.
      SameNicknameException - If the client choices a nickname already in use.
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If the user wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).

    • updateServerSelection

      void updateServerSelection(ClientRMIInterface client, SlotChoice[] SC) throws RemoteException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Updates the server with the slots selected by the input client.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that sent the update.
      SC - The slots selected by the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.

    • updateServerReorder

      void updateServerReorder(ClientRMIInterface client, OrderChoice C) throws RemoteException
      Updates the server with the slots selected by the input client.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that sent the update.
      C - The order chosen by the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.

    • updateServerInsert

      void updateServerInsert(ClientRMIInterface client, int column) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Updates the server with the shelf column to perform the insertion chosen by the input client.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that sent the update.
      column - The column of the shelf chosen by the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If the user wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).

    • updateServerChoices

      void updateServerChoices(ClientRMIInterface client, int number) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Updates the server with the number of slots selected by the input client.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that sent the update.
      number - The number of slots selected by the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If the user wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).
